description: Gets a list of all storage credentials that have been assigned to given metastore.

name.description: The credential name. The name must be unique within the metastore.

read_only.description: Whether the storage credential is only usable for read operations.

owner.description: Username of current owner of credential.

full_name.description: The full name of the credential.

id.description: The unique identifier of the credential.

created_at.description: Time at which this Credential was created, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_at.description: Time at which this credential was last modified, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_by.description: Username of user who last modified the credential.

used_for_managed_storage.description: Whether this credential is the current metastore's root storage credential.
